descriptionlist.description:
Truly mute chats in Messages

Hates that badge count on Messages when muted chats arrive? Get this tweak. It'll automatically mark those messages as read.

Features:
  • Auto mark muted chats ("Hide Alerts" in Messages) as read. Effectively remove its badge count

  • "Mark All as Read" force/haptic touch menu

  • Remove muted messages automatically

  • Block calls by regex or country

  • Database for history of muted chats or blocked calls


This package tested to be working on iOS 13.5 AND 14.3. Might or might not work on lower iOS version.



To support development: https://www.paypal.me/udevs
